solution_line_template: She is making {total_servings} servings because {num_pies} x {servings_per_pie} = <<{num_pies}*{servings_per_pie}={total_servings}>>{total_servings}
Each guest has {apples_per_guest} apples because {servings_per_guest} x {apples_per_serving} = <<{servings_per_guest}*{apples_per_serving}={apples_per_guest}>>{apples_per_guest}
